title: Ep. #57 | Catching Up: Pink Sweat$
description:
Welcome to the show, Pink Sweat$! It’s no surprise that so many K-pop artists like BTS, NCT, and DAY6 love to cover PinkSweat$’s smooth R&B music. Let’s learn about his life story, songwriting process, and how he got to work with Crush on the song, “I Wanna Be Yours!"
Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.
Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios
Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !
SUPPORT & JOIN DIVE Studios' Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/divestudios
#EricNam #에릭남 #DaebakShow #DIVEStudios #PinkSweats #Crush #Honesty #IWannaBeYours

content:encoded:
Welcome to the show, Pink Sweat$! It’s no surprise that so many K-pop artists like BTS, NCT, and DAY6 love to cover PinkSweat$’s smooth R&B music. Let’s learn about his life story, songwriting process, and how he got to work with Crush on the song, “I Wanna Be Yours!" Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.
